name: Drug Info and Price History
description: An API to rapidly retrieve information about drug prices and history across a variety of sources

api_methods.name: Drug Info
api_methods.description: Returns information about the given drug

api_methods.name: genericname
api_methods.description: Given a brand name, returns a generic name

api_methods.name: Price History
api_methods.description: Returns an array of price histories when given a valid drug ID.
